fields.name: objectId
fields.doc: ZTF object identifier, also known as transient_object_id

fields.name: classification
fields.doc: Top-ranked contextual classification for the transient (NULL, AGN, BS, CV, NT, ORPHAN, SN, UNCLEAR, VS)

fields.name: association_type
fields.doc: Association classification for the transient (NULL, AGN, BS, CV, NT, ORPHAN, SN, UNCLEAR, VS)

fields.name: catalogue_table_name
fields.doc: Name/s of catalogue/s from which the best crossmatch is made

fields.name: catalogue_object_id
fields.doc: Identifier in the catalogue/s from which the best crossmatch is made

fields.name: catalogue_object_type
fields.doc: Type of catalogue from which the best crossmatch is made

fields.name: raDeg
fields.doc: RA in degrees of the transient

fields.name: decDeg
fields.doc: Dec in degrees of the transient

fields.name: separationArcsec
fields.doc: Transient's angular separation (arcseconds) from the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: northSeparationArcsec
fields.doc: Transient's angular separation (arcseconds) from the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: eastSeparationArcsec
fields.doc: Transient's angular separation (arcseconds) from the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: physical_separation_kpc
fields.doc: Distance in kilo parsec between transient and top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: direct_distance
fields.doc: Direct distance

fields.name: distance
fields.doc: Distance

fields.name: z
fields.doc: Redshift of the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: photoZ
fields.doc: Redshift of the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: photoZErr
fields.doc: Redshift of the top-ranked catalogue source match

fields.name: Mag
fields.doc: Magnitude

fields.name: MagFilter
fields.doc: Magnitude filter

fields.name: MagErr
fields.doc: Magnitude error

fields.name: classificationReliability
fields.doc: Reliability of classification

fields.name: annotator
fields.doc: Information about this annotation

fields.name: additional_output
fields.doc: Addititonal information about this annotation

fields.name: description
fields.doc: Long-form, human-readable summary of the transient's characteristics as infered from Sherlock's classification

fields.name: summary
fields.doc: Short-form summary of the transient's context usual for webpage quick-look summaries
